mapper.insert: insert into tbl_accompany (accompany_no, mem_no, write_date, start_date, end_date, title, content, accompany_status_code, gender_code, use_yn) values(accompany_no_seq.nextval, #{mem_no}, sysdate, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{title}, #{content}, #{accompany_status_code}, #{gender_code}, #{use_yn})
